## Project Information
This is a Vue3 frontend project with the following features:
- Vue 3 with Composition API
- ECharts for data visualization and analytics
- Frontend-backend separation architecture
- Modern build tools (Vite)
- TypeScript support
- Responsive design

## Development Guidelines
- Use Vue 3 Composition API syntax
- Follow Vue 3 best practices
- Integrate ECharts for all data visualization needs
- Design for API-based backend communication
- Maintain clean separation between frontend and backend
- Use modern ES6+ JavaScript/TypeScript features
